title: Customer Order Summary
description: Write a query to show each customer's name and total number of items they ordered (sum of quantities). Display name and total_items. Include all customers, even those with no orders (show 0 for them).
hint: Use LEFT JOIN across customers, orders, and order_items. Use COALESCE to turn NULL into 0.
solution: SELECT customers.name, COALESCE(SUM(order_items.quantity), 0) as total_items FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id LEFT JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id GROUP BY customers.name
